sentences.sContent: Don't interfere in other's private concerns.
When others interfere, it always makes trouble.
sentences.sCn: 别人一干涉， 麻烦就来了。

sentences.sContent: Anxiety can interfere with children’s performance at school.
sentences.sCn: 焦虑会影响孩子在学校的表现。

phrases.pCn: 干扰，干涉；妨碍；触动或弄坏；乱动；与……抵触

remMethod.val: inter(在…之间) ＋ fer(带来) ＋ e → 来到中间 → 干涉， 干预

trans.tranOther: to deliberately get involved in a situation where you are not wanted or needed
